imdb.plot outline: This tale will take audience members on a comedic, action-packed adventure with Lou, his crew, and various "characters" met along the way. The story features Lou who controls a prominent lemonade ring throughout the tri-state area. Lemonade is cut with narcotics, which renders it a controlled substance. Things go awry not only in the challenging times of hustling lemonade, but issues also arise within the lemonade running group. This web series is sure to keep audience members laughing, and on the edge of their seats with suspense.
imdb.title: When Life Gives You Lemons
akas: When Life Gives You Lemons (United States)
plot: This tale will take audience members on a comedic, action-packed adventure with Lou, his crew, and various "characters" met along the way. The story features Lou who controls a prominent lemonade ring throughout the tri-state area. Lemonade is cut with narcotics, which renders it a controlled substance. Things go awry not only in the challenging times of hustling lemonade, but issues also arise within the lemonade running group.
